name: Cookies and pine nuts - The feats of kalawasa
name_original: Cookies and pine nuts - The feats of kalawasa
description:
• I'm an owl engraved on a pumpkin, my human made me like this because he likes "mates burilados" a lot, like these.
  • I can't jump, but I can roll to get from one place to another.
  • I really like cookies, especially if they are dry, it makes me happy.
NOTES
  • I made this game in 3 days, it was a great challenge and a great experience.
CREDITS
  • All design, code, graphics by me.
  • SFX: Impact Sounds by kenney, all other sounds by Freesound.org
  • Ambient sounds: The first Birds singing in a forest, music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
